import React, { Component } from "react"; import moment from 'moment'; import "./filter.css"; class Filter extends Component { state = { currentDate : moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD"), category : "No category", length : "any", before : moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD"), after : "2000-01-01", }; //sending category up to app.js handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: [event.target.value] }, () => this.props.updateCategory(this.state.category, this.state.length, this.state.before, this.state.after) ); }; render() { return (
{"Filters"}
); } } export default Filter;
